news.content:
The phpMyFAQ Team is pleased to announce [phpMyFAQ 4.0.18](/download) and [phpMyFAQ 4.1.0-RC.7](/download), 
the "Jesse Jackson" releases.
These releases fix security vulnerabilities, update all third party dependencies, and fix all reported bugs.
[Click here to find a detailed security advisory](/security/advisory-2026-02-27).

The phpMyFAQ Team would like to announce the availability of [phpMyFAQ 4.1.0-RC.6](/download),
the "Eric Dane" releases.
This release fixes all reported bugs, and we updated our third party dependencies.

The phpMyFAQ Team is pleased to announce [phpMyFAQ 4.1.0-RC.5](/download), the "James Van Der Beek" release.
This release fixes all reported bugs, and we updated our third party dependencies.

Today [25 years](/25years) ago, Thorsten Rinne and Bastian Pöttner started with the development of phpMyFAQ. 
We would like to say thank-you to everyone who helped with the development and every one of our users! 
Happy 25th birthday, phpMyFAQ!

The phpMyFAQ Team is pleased to announce [phpMyFAQ 4.1.0-RC.4](/download), the "Rita Süssmuth" release.
This release fixes all reported bugs, and we updated our third party dependencies.

The phpMyFAQ Team would like to announce the availability of [phpMyFAQ 4.0.17](/download) and [phpMyFAQ 4.1.0-RC.3](/download),
the "Renée Good" releases.
These releases fix security vulnerabilities, update all third party dependencies, and fix all reported bugs.
[Click here to find a detailed security advisory](/security/advisory-2026-01-23).

The phpMyFAQ Team is pleased to announce [phpMyFAQ 4.1.0-RC.2](/download), the "Brigitte Bardot" release.
This release fixes all reported bugs, we updated all translations with Claude Code, and we updated our third party 
dependencies.
